DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate airway COPD patient , compare healthy volunteer , absorb steroid drug Symbicort Turbuhaler Seretide Diskus . The blood concentration steroid use surrogate marker .
DOC.criteria: COPD patient : ≥40 year age , Diagnosed COPD symptom ≥1 year , Prebronchodilatory FEV1 ≤55 % PN , Productive cough expectoration . Healthy volunteer : ≥18 year age , Healthy , Prebronchodilatory FEV1 > 80 % PN , Nonsmoker COPD patient : Current respiratory tract disorder COPD , Asthma 40 year age , Significant unstable cardiovascular disorder , Healthy volunteer : Use regular medication therapy , Pregnancy breastfeeding ,
